response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, valued at $1,500,000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exceptional offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to secure this item before it potentially becomes even more exclusive and valuable. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget, allowing you to make a decision that benefits both parties. Should you require any further information or discuss the details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this unique product into your possession.", "product_price": 1400000}
